Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It’s been quite a year and I hope all is well with you! Your Compliance Week license is expiring on {!Contact.Expiration_Date__c}, so don’t let your subscription benefits expire.
To more than 12,000 compliance professionals, Compliance Week means learning, resources and connections. Renew your subscription and continue your access to:
Industry-Leading News Award-winning features of real-world analysis, best practices, perspective, research, and shop talk. Thank you for your subscription and please lets us know if you have any questions!
Best Regards,
